cause.description:
All of us here at Save The Local Bands From Tragity would like to ask for your help to Support all local bands. Yes even the ones that suck ass. But its for a good cause. So get off your computer and stop reading this and playing around on MySpace (which is better than facebook) and go support a local band.
1. Save The Local Bands From Tragity is a cause that needs help NOW!!!
cause.mission: Our mission it to help local bands get up in the world and be herd from all.
cause.name: Save The Local Bands From Tragity
